# Worra Design Studio Portfolio

This is a minimalist Next.js portfolio website for "worra" design studio.

## Design Specifications
- Background color: #6320EE
- Text color: #FFFFFF (pure white)
- Font: Momo Trust Sans
- Style: Minimalist and modern
- Focus: Homepage with clean, simple layout

## Project Structure
- Next.js framework
- Custom CSS for styling
- Placeholder logo (to be replaced with SVG)
- Responsive design approach
